3.3 Down Referral to ASHA
3.3.1 CHO should guide the ASHA regarding the follow-up and ensuring treatment compliance to the 
pregnant women. 
3.4 Linkages with Line departments
3.4.1 Linkages with ICDS for organising VHSND and maternal nutrition.
3.4.2 Linkages with ICTC for referral and testing and treatment of HIV suspected cases.
